A2 the number 60: fifty-nine, sixty, sixty-one She plans to retire at sixty (= when she is 60 years old).
More examplesFewer examplesforty, fifty, sixtyThere are sixty seconds in a minute.He must be about sixty, whereas his wife looks about thirty.Sal reckons over sixty people were there but I think that's a slight exaggeration.He looks great and yet he must be pushing sixty by now.
